text:
[Verse]
Feel the drops now on my skin
Joy within the storm begins
Splashing puddles like a game
Dancing in the rain

[Verse 2]
Clouds above they slowly move
Even dark skies have a groove
Thunder roars but I don't mind
Dancing in the rain

[Chorus]
Dance dance dance
In the rain oh
Laugh laugh laugh
In the rain now

[Verse 3]
Wet hair clings it's cool and free
Twists and turns on wild spree
Rainy day's my stage to claim
Dancing in the rain

[Bridge]
No umbrella no retreat
Rhythm in each rainy beat
Happy in the pouring sky
Dancing in the rain

[Chorus]
Dance dance dance
In the rain oh
Laugh laugh laugh
In the rain now
title: Dancing in the Rain
